name: Puzzle Adventure
description:
This is my second puzzle game, and my entry for Tiger Jam #2. It was made entirely with Puzzle Script.

The game saves automatically, feel free to take a break if you need one (you probably will).

Thanks for checking the game ;-) Share if you enjoyed!

Controls :

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • R : Restart
  • Z : Cancel your previous moves

Sources are available to download.

Update 1.1 :

  • Fixed a level that was just too hard too soon
  • Added sounds
  • Remade the whole story
